channel.title: Python on Shangeth
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Shangeth

item.title: Character Generating RNN
item.description: Character level language model of RNN(LSTM) in PyTorch.

item.title: Computer Vision Security System
item.description: Computer vision security system server build with Python, OpenCV, Flask web server.

item.title: Emojification
item.description: Emojify a sentence with NLP, flask server to emojify a sentence.

item.title: Hand Gesture Recognition
item.description: Recognizing the hand gesture using CNN feature extraction.

item.title: Lane Detection with Deep Learning
item.description: Lane Detection for self driving cars with Deep Learning(CNN) with the camera image data.

item.title: Multi Tasking Learning for face characterization
item.description: Multitasking learning to use the CNN extracted features for multiple tasks like predicting age, sex, face direction, etc.

item.title: NYTimes Topic Modelling
item.description: Topic Modelling for New York Times news articles for given dates using NYTimes API.

item.title: Neural Style Transfer
item.description: Neural Style transfer of images in PyTorch.

item.title: PyRevShell
item.description: A server client Reverse shell using python, can use any device’s shell using this from another device in the network.

item.title: Self Driving Cars Steering Angle Prediction
item.description: Prediction of which direction the car should change the steering direction in autonomous mode with the camera image as the input using transfer learning and fine tuning.

item.title: Self Driving Cars Vehicle Detection
item.description: Detection of other vehicles for self driving cars with YOLO in tensorflow.

item.title: Seq2Seq Machine Translation
item.description: Machine Translation english to french using Seq2Seq Attention model in PyTorch.

item.title: SockChat
item.description: Sock Chat is a server-client chat application with database which can be used to any web server or software applications,

item.title: Twitter Sentiment analysis
item.description: Sentiment analysis of tweets of any topic fetched with twitter API and sentiment analysis of the tweets with NLTK.

item.title: Vehicle Speed Estimation
item.description: Estimation of a vehicle’s speed with its camera frames using deep leanring in PyTorch.
